mapper.sql: id, attraction_name, attraction_name_en, location, contact_phone, contact_person, contact_email, booking_type, website_url, email_address, advance_days, description, images, rating, status, created_at, updated_at
mapper.update: UPDATE attractions SET attraction_name = #{attractionName}, attraction_name_en = #{attractionNameEn}, location = #{location}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone}, contact_person = #{contactPerson}, contact_email = #{contactEmail}, booking_type = #{bookingType}, website_url = #{websiteUrl}, email_address = #{emailAddress}, advance_days = #{advanceDays}, description = #{description}, images = #{images}, rating = #{rating}, status = #{status}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM attractions ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT FROM attractions WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY attraction_name
SELECT FROM attractions WHERE booking_type = #{bookingType} AND status = 'active' ORDER BY attraction_name
SELECT FROM attractions WHERE location = #{location} AND status = 'active' ORDER BY attraction_name
SELECT FROM attractions WHERE (attraction_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR attraction_name_en LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')) AND status = 'active' ORDER BY attraction_name
